content.html: Duvet is an #OpenSource tool from developers at AWS that extracts RFC 2119 requirements from IETF specifications, then generates a report on each requirement, where it is honored in source code, as well as how that code is tested. Neat! github.com/awslabs/duvet
content.value:
Duvet is an #OpenSource tool from developers at AWS that extracts RFC 2119 requirements from IETF specifications, then generates a report on each requirement, where it is honored in source code, as well as how that code is tested.

Neat!
github.com/awslabs/duvet
